 2018-14992018-11-29,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Martin Bédard ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. MARTIN BÉDARD, a puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the districts of Hull, Labelle and Pontiac, effective November 30, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
